```{r warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(magrittr)
library(kableExtra)
library(zeallot)
library(yaml)


source('code/five_years/five_years-utils.R')

outcome <- '5Y. ODI - Score (%)'

k_fold <- 10
tuneLength <- 5
models <- c('elastic', 'boosting')
create_model(
  outcome, first_visit=TRUE, increment=FALSE, k_fold, tuneLength, models
)
  
  #   - "2Y. ODI - Score (%)"
  # - "2Y. SRS22 - SRS Subtotal score"
  # - "2Y. SF36 - MCS"
  # - "2Y. SF36 - PCS" 
```
